verb.description: Optics. To improve, restore, or alter the profile of (a lens or mirror, especially the mirror of a reflecting telescope).
Chiefly North American. To calculate again arithmetically; to recalculate.

origin: Late Middle English (in an earlier sense). From re- + figure, originally after Middle French refigurer to remake, recreate or its etymon post-classical Latin refigurare to transform (Vulgate).
